column3: allows the implementation of Java Servlets and JavaServer Pages (JSP) and also can use XML.
a framework for rapidly developing domain-driven apps in Java
a logging library for java dev

gRPC is a modern open source high performance RPC framework that can run in any environment. It can efficiently connect services in and across data centers with pluggable support for load balancing, tracing, health checking and authentication. It is also applicable in last mile of distributed computing to connect devices, mobile applications and browsers to backend services.
Swagger is a simple yet powerful representation of your RESTful API.
A fast dependency injector for Android and Java.
Project Lombok makes java a spicier language by adding 'handlers' that know how to build and compile simple, boilerplate-free, not-quite-java code.
A damn simple library for building production-ready RESTful web services.
A library to integrate Facebook into your Android mobile application.
Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS
An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling
Admin UI for administration of spring boot applications
A fast JSON parser/generator for Java

JNA provides Java programs easy access to native shared libraries (DLLs on Windows) without writing anything but Java code—no JNI or native code is required. This functionality is comparable to Windows' Platform/Invoke and Python's ctypes. Access is dynamic at runtime without code generation.
Java HTML Parser
A Language and an run time platform(JVM like) that encapsulate OOPS and patterns an integral part of the development

Activiti is a Business Process Management (BPM) and workflow system targeted at business people, developers and system admins. Its core is a super-fast and rock-solid BPMN 2 process engine for Java. It's open-source and distributed under the Apache license. Activiti runs in any Java application, on a server, on a cluster or in the cloud. It integrates perfectly with Spring, it is extremely lightweight and based on simple concepts.

Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

The MyBatis SQL mapper framework makes it easier to use a relational database with object-oriented applications. MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor. Simplicity is the biggest advantage of the MyBatis data mapper over object relational mapping tools.
Redisson - distributed and scalable Java data structures (Set, Map, ConcurrentMap, List, Queue, Lock, AtomicLong, CountDownLatch, Publish / Subscribe) on top of Redis server

Storm is a free and open source distributed realtime computation system. Storm makes it easy to reliably process unbounded streams of data, doing for realtime processing what Hadoop did for batch processing.
Apache Spark is an open source cluster computing system that aims to make data analytics fast — both fast to run and fast to write.
The Apache Tika™ toolkit detects and extracts metadata and structured text content from various documents using existing parser libraries.
Cassandra is a highly scalable, eventually consistent, distributed, structured key-value store.
mocking framework,  JAVA-based library used for unit testing
Catch common Java mistakes as compile-time errors

Apache JMeter may be used to test performance both on static and dynamic resources, Web dynamic applications. It simulates a heavy load on server.
Its features include:

Metrics is a Java library which gives you unparalleled insight into what your code does in production.
Metrics provides a powerful toolkit of ways to measure the behavior of critical components in your production environment.
A suite of utilities for bringing continous integration to your projects (not the other way around) with jenkins CI
